mapper.update: update qt_financial_borrow_money set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, productId, couponId, userId, amount, daynum, status, arriveAmount, auditCost,manageCost, reductionExemption, applyAt,createdAt from qt_financial_borrow_money where status = "3r" or status = "3e" limit #{start},#{end};
select count(1) from qt_financial_borrow_money where status = "3r" or status = "3e"
